hero.tagline: Together towards the success of your projects
hero.title: Chartered Accountant in Laeken
hero.description: My Compta, chartered accountant in Laeken, supports individuals and businesses in their accounting, tax and business creation processes with rigor and proximity.

career.title: Your expert's journey
description: With 20 years of experience, your expert supports you in accounting, taxation, VAT declarations and business creation in Belgium.
Rigor, independence and confidentiality are at the heart of our services to optimize your management and secure your obligations.

vision.title: Vision
points: Support each client in the success of their projects.
Transform accounting into a simple and useful daily tool.
Be a trusted partner for entrepreneurs, managers and individuals.

methods.title: Methods
points: Favor exchange and personalized advice rather than one-size-fits-all solutions.
Use modern tools to simplify management and save time.
Combine experience and human approach to provide concrete answers.
Support clients step by step, according to the evolution of their needs.

values.title: Values
points: Clarity: understandable advice, without complicated language.
Commitment: each client is followed with attention and respect.

services.title: Explore our areas of expertise
services.description: We offer tailor-made services to meet your needs and support you at every stage of your projects.

businessSetup.title: Business creation / liquidation
businessSetup.description: Complete support to launch or close your company with peace of mind.

accounting.title: Accounting
accounting.description: Reliable accounting management to effectively manage your activity.

taxation.title: Taxation
taxation.description: Personalized tax advice to optimize your obligations and costs.

consulting.title: Consulting
consulting.description: Strategic support to develop your business.

competences.title: Our skills
description: Your tax advisor ensures compliance with standards, chooses the most suitable regime and defends your interests.
He accompanies you in declaring your income, assets and investments, simplifying each step.
Thanks to his expertise, he optimizes your taxation with complete transparency to preserve and enhance your assets.

footerCta.title: Contact us today
footerCta.description: Our team is at your disposal to answer your questions and guide you in your steps.

myCompta.title: My Compta
description: Our accounting and tax expertise firm supports entrepreneurs, managers and individuals in all stages of their development. Much more than a simple administrative partner, we provide you with clear, responsive and personalized support, adapted to your needs and ambitions.
Our priority: to offer you a reliable, tailor-made and accessible service, so that you can move forward with complete peace of mind.

founder.title: The founder's vision
description: With over 20 years of experience as a chartered accountant, our founder has extensive expertise in accounting, taxation, and business management.
Rigorous and attentive, he created My Compta in 2020 to offer personalized and digitalized support to self-employed, small businesses and individuals throughout Belgium.

hero.title: Tailor-made accounting support
description: My Compta ensures complete management of your accounting, whether you are self-employed, a liberal profession or a small business. We guarantee rigorous monitoring in compliance with your legal obligations so that you can focus on developing your activity.
Thanks to our personalized approach, you benefit from advice adapted to your situation and a clear vision of your financial health.

steps.title: The key stages of your accounting
list: Keeping and recording accounting operations
Periodic declarations (VAT, withholding taxes, taxes)
Preparation and filing of annual accounts
Monitoring of cash flow and remuneration
Analysis of results and tax optimization

digital.title: A digitalized and responsive service
description: With My Compta, your exchanges and documents are centralized and secured online. You gain in simplicity, speed and availability. We remain by your side throughout the year to answer your questions, anticipate your deadlines and optimize your situation.
Our objective: to make your accounting clear, fluid and useful for your decisions.

hero.title: Business creation
description: My Compta supports you step by step in creating your business, from analyzing the viability of your project to administrative procedures. We help you choose the appropriate legal structure, build a solid business plan and launch your activity on clear, secure and sustainable foundations.

steps.title: Key stages of business creation
list: Analysis of project viability
Choice of legal and tax structure
Drafting of articles of incorporation
Registration and administrative procedures
Setting up accounting

support.title: Personalized support
description: Beyond formalities, we advise you on tax strategy, available aid and obligations to be respected. We also prepare the start-up of your accounting for a serene and compliant start.
Our expertise helps you avoid pitfalls and saves you time to focus on the essential: developing your project.

liquidation.title: Business liquidation
description: In case of voluntary cessation or bankruptcy, My Compta guides you through all the stages of liquidating your business. From closing accounts to drafting legal documents, we provide rigorous and secure support to allow you to turn this page with complete peace of mind and in compliance with your obligations.

hero.title: Tax optimization
description: My Compta helps you master your taxation by adapting your situation to current laws while optimizing your income. Whether you are self-employed, manager of a small business or individual, we analyze your situation to legally reduce your tax burden and secure your asset decisions.
Our objective: to transform taxation into a growth lever and not a constraint.

steps.title: The key stages of your tax monitoring
list: Prepare and file your tax returns (individuals and companies)
Implement appropriate tax planning and optimization
Carry out an asset assessment and propose investment solutions
Manage tax audits and ensure administrative follow-up
Adapt your taxation to legal developments and your objectives

anticipation.title: Anticipation and serenity
description: Taxation is constantly evolving; this is why we ensure permanent monitoring to anticipate changes and adjust your strategies. Thanks to our expertise and pedagogy, you keep control over your situation and can make informed decisions, with complete peace of mind.

hero.title: Management consulting and strategic support
description: My Compta supports you well beyond the numbers, by providing you with an external and objective view of the management of your activity. We help you make the right decisions to structure, develop and sustain your business, taking into account your constraints and ambitions. Our personalized approach allows you to have a clear and realistic vision of your business at each stage of its evolution.

steps.title: The key stages of our support
list: Analysis of profitability and financial performance
Development of forecast budgets and cash flow plans
Implementation of monitoring tools and management indicators
Assistance with strategic decision-making and financing research
Regular monitoring and adjustment of objectives

partnership.title: A trusted and close partner
description: With My Compta, you benefit from a responsive, available and attentive interlocutor. We work in a spirit of lasting partnership, anticipating your needs and advising you proactively.
Our mission: to help you manage your business with confidence, with informed and secure decisions.
